creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque with one hollow hoop; hoop ends in a rabbit on both sides; connecting piece with three cones on it; hoop has a border of relief heart shapes; center of torque has a building with two people standing inside embracing; a person with a giant leaf on either side of the building; on the left side there is an elephant with two people riding it; the elephant is followed by a rooster; on the right side there is a dragon with a person on it; the dragon is followed by a butterfly
title: Torque
